content: Please stop the “woman as victim” mantra. No one does anything without a pay-off, real or imagined, immediate or delayed. No one. What is the pay-off to women for their “efforts that involve giving care, carrying a burden, and taking responsibility for the function or well-being of others”? And who does this effort go unnoticed by? Who should notice it? How much? Everyone does things that go unnoticed. Please.
